summary: When two straight friends go into couples therapy, they're so convincing that even they start to question their relationship.
cast: Larisa Oleynik|Molly Hagan|Richard Moll|Jenny O'Hara|Dan Gauthier|Pat Carroll|Sean Maher|Sigrid Thornton|Tanya Clarke|Eric Lively|Jeffrey Vincent Parise|Tara Karsian|Russell Sams|Andrea Grano|Ginette Rhodes|Patrick O'Connor|Andrew James Jones|Kathy Grano
title: BFFs
